description:
Introducing the lockdown worldwide was to ensure that hospital didn't become overwhelmed. 
In good faith, we obeyed. 
But it should be a wake up call when dangerous criminals are out of jail in the name of health, whilst mothers are being arrested, having their kids ripped out of their arms.
Something is really wrong when Google and Facebook are censoring Dr Judy Mikovits amongst other brave doctors, but promoting Bill Gates as the vaccine super hero. 
Before you blindly accept any ""official guidelines"", research whilst you still can. 
Bill Gates is not a hero. 
Governments are easy corrupted by those with money. 
The information we are force feed by the main media is controlled. 
And I am very sorry to say this, but it may get much worse very soon as they keep pushing their vaccine pre-planned agenda. 
That is why we need to support community and protected our civil liberties now. 
Our human rights are literally being pull out from beneath our feet whilst we all too busy watching manipulated death numbers. This information is still out there for you to check for yourself. 
I recommend starting your research with Dr Mikovits and Dr Rashid Butter.
#idonotconsent
#saynotobillgates
#nonewnormal
